options: ['one son   and two daughters', 'one daughter and two sons', 'one daughter and one son', 'two daughters and two sons']
questions: Mr. White and Mrs. White have   _  .
article:
Look at the photo. The two girls have big blue eyes and long brown hair. They are ten. They are in the same class. The one in a yellow skirt is Lily. The other one in an orange skirt is Lucy. Bob is their   brother  . He is in a blue cap. He is a high school student. Their dad is Mr. White. He is in a brown coat. Their mom is Mrs. White. She is in black shoes. Look!Lucy and Lily are in the green car.
.
